version_description:
– Now you can purchase Canadian numbers
– Fixed minor issues

Stay with us and don't forget to leave your ratings and reviews because this is what keeps the app development going!

Good news – a huge update is coming!
– Now you can purchase numbers of 31 countries

Stay with us and don't forget to leave your ratings and reviews because this is what keeps the app development going!

– Now you can sign in with Google, Facebook or Twitter
– Fixed minor issues

Stay with us and don't forget to leave your ratings and reviews because this is what keeps the app development going!

– Added more languages. Now the app is available in Dutch, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish
– Fixed minor issues

Stay with us and don't forget to leave your ratings and reviews because this is what keeps the app development going!

Thanks for staying with us! The new version offers:
– Little UI navigation improvements
– Special tariff offers! Get up to 50% discount for subscriptions!
– Bug fixes

Please leave your reviews on the App Store or send your feedback to support@bpmob.com

Dear friends!
Based on your feedback we've included some nice things to the new version:
– MMS for USA and Canada
– Full iPhone X compatibility
– Balance sheet on SMS and calls screens
– Stability and performance improvements

Don't forget to send feedback to support@bpmob.com and leave your reviews on the App Store!

Thank you for choosing Second Phone! In this version, we’ve added a number of important improvements:
— Possibility to get two additional phone numbers inside the app
— Updated My Account screen: it’s easier to manage phone numbers
— UX improvements and app performance optimization

Don’t forget to send feedback to support@bpmobile.com and leave your review on the App Store!
It helps us to make the app even better.

The new version of Second Phone Number is Smarter, Smoother and Faster! Fulfill all your business needs, and enjoy a nice price list and awesome stability.

From now on, you no longer have to worry that your number may expire since the number’s lifespan is now unlimited (in case you have an active subscription).

Also, you can now forward calls to Voicemail – the function is available for US numbers.

Don’t forget to send feedback to support@bpmobile.com and leave your reviews on the App Store!

Here is what we have added in the new version:
– PIN Lock and Touch/Face ID support. Now you can be sure that nobody will access your Second Phone – just go to the app settings and turn on the PIN Lock function!

Don't forget to send feedback to support@bpmob.com and leave your reviews on the App Store!

Significant Updates!
• Important usability improvements
• In-app currency
• International calls & SMS
• Reduced calling rates
• Errors that occurred while calling are resolved

Let us know if you face any difficulties when updating to the new app version. We’ll be glad to assist you! support@bpmob.com
Separate work and personal communication with the Second Phone App

– Fixed an occasional issue when the user doesn’t hear the interlocutor

Don't forget to send feedback to support@bpmob.com and leave your reviews on the App Store!

Here is what we have added in the new version:
– Fixed minor issues

Don't forget to send feedback to support@bpmobile.com and leave your reviews on the App Store!

– Sir, did you hear Second Phone Number has changed its design?
– No, what’s about it?
– It’s become even more convenient! Now you can get several numbers in no time and quickly switch them.
– Wow! And what about the issues with international calls?
– Everything works flawlessly now! You may easily send SMS/MMS and make calls!
– What else?
– After install, you will get your first number absolutely for free for 3 days.
– No need to continue. I’ve already downloaded it.

Dear friends!
Based on your feedback we've included some nice things to the new version:
– From now on you'll never forget to prolong your number!
– We also optimized the interface and fixed bugs

Don't forget to send feedback to support@bpmobile.com and leave your reviews on the App Store!

Long-awaited update!
– You can now set your numbers to renew automatically with auto-prolongation. No expiration! Simply subscribe, keep cool, and enjoy our premium features for your business and communication.
– What’s more, we have fixed tons of bugs and continue to improve the app interface and usability.

Thank you for your loyalty! We carefully read all your feedback on support@bpmobile.com.

The new version of Second Phone Number is Smarter, Smoother and Faster! Fulfill all your business needs, and enjoy a nice price list and awesome stability.

From now on, you no longer have to worry that your number may expire since the number’s lifespan is now unlimited (in case you have an active subscription).

Also, you can now forward calls to Voicemail – the function is available for US numbers.

Don’t forget to send feedback to support@bpmobile.com and leave your reviews on the App Store!

Thank you for choosing 2Number! This update includes some important improvements:
— New elegant splash screen to show that our app is so beautifully designed that you’ll enjoy every second in its space
— Minor bug fixes and some other adjustments to make your calling experience even better

We keep fine-tuning the app to your needs and look forward to your reviews and feedback!

— Some fixes and improvements for a better experience with the app

Don’t forget to send your feedback to support@bpmobile.com and leave your review on the App Store!

In this update you’ll find:
— Refreshed My Account screen: information about your balance and available phone numbers is always at hand now.
— Business Hours, Voicemail and Call Recorder features can now be found on the Settings screen—take a look!
— We squashed a few bugs and made some performance improvements.

Don’t forget to send feedback to support@bpmobile.com and leave your review on the App Store! It helps us to make the app even better.
